summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1654, for the improvement of Thirty-second Avenue Northwest, from West Fifty-seventh Street to West Sixty-fourth Street, and West Fifty-seventh Street, from Thirty-second Avenue Northwest to West Fifty-eighth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, with the necessary crosswalks, under Ordinance No. 17473 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
